    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)

      • isWorking

        public static boolean isWorking()
        Checks if the Updater is currently working (performing its job).
        Returns:
        true if the updater is currently running, false otherwise

      • updateIfNeeded

        public static void updateIfNeeded​(java.io.File fMingleDir,
                                  boolean bDryRun,
                                  java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.Boolean> fnExcuteUpdate)
        Checks if updates are needed by comparing catalog.json versions. If versions differ, executes the consumer with the number of files needing updates.
        Parameters:
        fMingleDir - Base directory path to check
        bDryRun - If true, simulate updates without modifying files
        fnExcuteUpdate - Receives the number of files that are needed to be updated and returns true if the update method has to be invoked.

      • update

        public static boolean update​(java.io.File fMingleDir,
                             boolean bDryRun,
                             java.io.File catalogFile)
        Updates files from GitHub repository for the specified path.
        Parameters:
        fMingleDir - Base directory path to check
        bDryRun - If true, simulate updates without modifying files
        catalogFile - The catalog file to use for the update.
        Returns:
        true if update process completed successfully, false otherwise
